verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:31
verses.text: That this shall be no grief unto thee, nor offence of heart unto my lord, either that thou hast shed blood causeless, or that my lord hath avenged himself: but when the Lord shall have dealt well with my lord, then remember thine handmaid.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:32
verses.text: And David said to Abigail, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, which sent thee this day to meet me:

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:33
verses.text: And blessed be thy advice, and blessed be thou, which hast kept me this day from coming to shed blood, and from avenging myself with mine own hand.
